title: New York TV is sending a strange warning before the Hoboken train crash.
subtitle: WKTV participated in the testing of the planned emergency warning system throughout the country, but a strange and unplanned message led to the Hoboken train conspiracy theories that crashed the train.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The night before the Hoboken train crash, a station in North New York aired a strange and annoying test of the emergency alert system.
